name: Charles Swindoll
quotes: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.
The remarkable thing is, we have a choice everyday regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day.
When you have vision it affects your attitude. Your attitude is optimistic rather than pessimistic.

name: Winston Churchill
quotes: If you are going through hell, keep going.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal, it is the courage to continue that counts.
To improve is to change, so to be perfect is to change often.
All wisdom is not new wisdom.

name: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
An ounce of patience is worth more than a tonne of preaching.
In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
A man is but a product of his thoughts.  What he thinks he becomes.

name: Albert Einstein
quotes: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used to create them.
The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once.
It should be possible to explain the laws of physics to a barmaid.

name: Maya Angelou
quotes: You alone are enough.  You have nothing to prove to anybody
We need much less than we think we need.
I've learned that making a living is not the same thing as making a life.
I can be changed by what happens to me but I refuse to be reduced by it.
